title: Interactive Plagiarism Prevention Education for Professional Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic competency in academic writing and information retrieval
context.additional_context: Strengthening plagiarism prevention competencies required for professional practitioners in medical, legal, and technical fields when drafting official documents.

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish five major types of plagiarism and apply them to real-world cases.
Learners can apply ethical writing skills in practice by utilizing citation, paraphrasing, and summarization strategies.
Learners can perform self-diagnosis processes using plagiarism detection tools such as Turnitin.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
